servers.description: This is your API mock endpoint. When called, it will simulate the behavior of your API.

/repository.summary: Nexus webhook callbacks for repository elements

post.description: Callback triggered by Nexus when a Repository is created, modified, or deleted

parameters.name: X-Webhook-Signature
parameters.description: This is the HMAC digest of the body of the payload, if an optional secret key has been configured

schema.description: This is the HMAC digest of the body of the payload, if an optional secret key has been configured

parameters.name: X-Nexus-Webhook-Delivery
parameters.description: This is a unique UUID identifying the event

schema.description: This is a unique UUID identifying the event

parameters.name: X-Nexus-Webhook-Id
parameters.description: This is the event type, e.g. rm:repository:asset

schema.description: This is the event type, e.g. rm:repository:asset

post.description: Callback triggered by Nexus when an Asset is modified

parameters.name: X-Webhook-Signature
parameters.description: This is the HMAC digest of the body of the payload, if an optional secret key has been configured

schema.description: This is the HMAC digest of the body of the payload, if an optional secret key has been configured

parameters.name: X-Nexus-Webhook-Delivery
parameters.description: This is a unique UUID identifying the event

schema.description: This is a unique UUID identifying the event

parameters.name: X-Nexus-Webhook-Id
parameters.description: This is the event type, e.g. rm:repository:asset

schema.description: This is the event type, e.g. rm:repository:asset

post.description: Callback triggered by Nexus when a Component is modified

parameters.name: X-Webhook-Signature
parameters.description: This is the HMAC digest of the body of the payload, if an optional secret key has been configured

schema.description: This is the HMAC digest of the body of the payload, if an optional secret key has been configured

parameters.name: X-Nexus-Webhook-Delivery
parameters.description: This is a unique UUID identifying the event

schema.description: This is a unique UUID identifying the event

parameters.name: X-Nexus-Webhook-Id
parameters.description: This is the event type, e.g. rm:repository:asset

schema.description: This is the event type, e.g. rm:repository:asset

RepositoryNotification.description: Payload returned when repository is created inside of Nexus Repository

timestamp.description: The ISO 8601 representation of the time the event occurred

nodeId.description: A UUID that identifies which Nexus Repository Manager node the event originated from

initiator.description: The userId or "anonymous" for system events

action.description: A string that identifies the action performed on the repository

format.description: A string that identifies the repository format type

name.description: A string that identifies the repository name

type.description: A string that identifies the type of repository

RepositoryComponentNotification.description: Payload returned when a component is created inside of Nexus Repository Manager.

timestamp.description: The ISO 8601 representation of the time the event occurred

nodeId.description: A UUID that identifies which Nexus Repository Manager node the event originated from

initiator.description: The userId or "anonymous" for system events

repositoryName.description: A string that identifies the repository where the event occurred

action.description: A string that identifies the action performed on the component

id.description: A UUID that identifies the assets ID

format.description: A string that identifies the repository format type

name.description: A string that identifies the component name

group.description: A string that identifies the component group

version.description: A string that identifies the component version

RepositoryAssetNotification.description: Payload returned when an asset is created inside of Nexus Repository Manager.

timestamp.description: The ISO 8601 representation of the time the event occurred

nodeId.description: A UUID that identifies which Nexus Repository Manager node the event originated from

initiator.description: The userId or "anonymous" for system events

repositoryName.description: A string that identifies the repository where the event occurred

action.description: A string that identifies the action performed on the asset

id.description: A UUID that identifies the assets ID

format.description: A string that identifies the repository format type

name.description: A string that identifies the asset name
